the perfect puzzle game specimen.
1. great idea, simple yet allows for a lot of interesting and difficult puzzles
2. great execution
3. great story and presentation
so just buy it.

This game has seriously changed my point of view about online games. My first playtrough was done with no major spoilers, but after that, I spent a lot of time searching for lore. The lore of this game is amazing, lots of fun interactions and dialogue that I spent days thinking about.
This game is so good at making you feel a part of the story.

Co-op has to be one of my favourite features, I even finished it before the single-player campaign! I required approximately 15-20 hrs just on co-op, and had a lot of fun!

I highly recommend this game, but you already knew that ;)
don't play the multiplayer, friendships will be lost
